heading: HB03342
0: AN ACT CREATING A SPECIAL ECONOMIC AND TOURISM ZONE AND FREE PORT IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF SALCEDO, MERCEDES AND GUIUAN, INCLUDING THE ISLANDS OF CALICOAN, HOMONHON, SULUAN AND MANICANI, IN THE PROVINCE OF EASTERN SAMAR, CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE EASTERN SAMAR SPECIAL ECONOMIC AND TOURISM ZONE AUTHORITY, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
